General.Name: Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of rubber hose series products in China. It provides cooling system hoses, fuel series hoses, oil cooling pipes, turbocharger pipelines, brake system hoses, power steering system hoses, nylon tubes, body accessories systems, and in and out system hoses and assemblies. The company's products are used in automobiles, motorcycles, and other machinery manufacturers. It also exports its products to the United States, Canada, Japan, Vietnam, India, South Africa, Italy, Croatia, and internationally. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Dazhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Bohai  Mao
2.Title: Dep. GM, Quality Exam Section & Production Head and Non-Independent Director
